org.hps.record.daqconfig

Class FADCConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hps.record.daqconfig.IDAQConfig
      • org.hps.record.daqconfig.FADCConfig

  • public class FADCConfig
extends IDAQConfig
    Class FADCConfig stores FADC configuration settings parsed from the an EVIO file. This class manages the following properties:
    • FADC Mode
    • NSA
    • NSB
    • FADC Window Width
    • FADC Window Time Offset
    • Max Pulses per Channel Window
    • Crystal Gains
    • Crystal Thresholds
    • Crystal Pedestals
